title: Cushion Cover, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidered
provenance: Purchased in February 1952 from the Cohen collection, formerly in the Ikle collection at St. Gallen, at Ginsburg and Levy's.
description: Cushion cover with small tassels in an allover interlocked octagon containing small blossoms, needlework trimming. In red and yellow silk on linen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cushion Cover, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidered. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-89.
